Key Match Events: Jusuf Nurkic's split free throws with 0.8 seconds remaining sealed the win for the Phoenix Suns
Pre-Game Insights: Jason Kidd expressed high hopes for the Mavericks' bench at the start of the season
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Kidd expressed disappointment with the Mavericks' bench performance and emphasized the need for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks starters led the team, but the bench was outscored by the Phoenix Suns' bench
Others: The Mavericks dropped to 5-4 after the loss, and their next three games will be on the road, beginning against the Denver Nuggets
